entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ProgressColor does not work on Mac Catalyst with the macOS UI Idiom #20876
  • Permission bug: Bluetooth scanning without location permission on Android 12+ #20871
  • Controls in ListView.Header and Footer don't raise Loaded/Unloaded #20869
  • .Net MAUI iOS app install but does not update #20868
  • Font Icons in Shell Tabs not showing in iOS #20866
  • The keyboard switches from numeric to alphabetic when assigning text from the TextChangedEvent to the Entry control. #20864
  • ImageEditor control is not visible inside Frame on iOS #20862
  • FlyoutPage Android app crashing on orientation change #20858
    Backlog
  • Viewcell tap gesture not working with datatemplate selector in MAUI 8.0 #20857
  • [Bug][Maccatalyst][IOS], ShouldChangeCharacters override method is not called while typing the accent keys. #20856
  • Grouped CollectionView items not rendered properly on Android, works on Windows #20855

Closed

  • DataBinding corrupted: not updating values, when it does, it’s alternating with 0 value #20821
  • .NET MAUI Blazory hybrid .AddBlazorWebViewDeveloperTools() Issue #20859
  • Running unpackaged Windows app as admin prevents FilePicker from working #20830
    Backlog
  • continuation of androidx.collection.ArrayMapKt is defined multiple times #18665 #20561

PullRequests

Created

  • Document ICanvas #20881
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Update all dependencies #20879
  • [Windows] Fix template check for item recycle #20875
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, i/regression
  • Permissions (BT & WiFi): don't add AccessFineLocation to required permissions if NeverForLocation flag is present #20874
    community ✨
  • [ci] Fix versions again when no sha provided #20873
  • Add IEffectControlProvider docs #20872
  • [Win] Double tap behavior #20870
    community ✨
  • Graphics TextAttribute wrongly uses FontName value for FontSize #20861
    area/fonts 🅰️
  • Improve WebAuthenticator API docs with exceptions #20860
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Fix BlazorWebView Failing To Load Iframes With Parent #20854
    area/blazor 🕸️, community ✨

Merged

  • Add 9.0.0-preview.1.9973 to issue template #20880
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #20865
  • Ignore ScrollRectToVisible if KeyboardAutoManagerScroll is enabled in ItemsViewController #19875
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • iOS Shell TitleView Update Height #20795
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, migration-compatibility, .NET 8 SR3
  • [UITest] Re-enable iOS Scrolling tests #20618
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • [XamlC] Prioritize compiled markup extensions over primitive types #20808
  • Fix page swap from background #19532
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭
  • Fix XAML intellisense and hot reload in Visual Studio 2022 #20851

Updated

  • [ci] Enable 1ES PT #20728
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    platform/android 🤖, area/FlyoutPage, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [WIP] Testing timeouts for iOS device tests #20843
    do-not-merge
  • [Trimming] Use typed bindings internally #20567
    area/Xaml </>
  • Document missing properties for ViewHandler #20853
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Trimming] Fix event trigger trimming warnings #20810
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Double dash in input field crash fix #20584
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.5 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Remove Switch On/Off content #20487
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Enable now passing tests and add some TableView categories #20531
    area/testing, area/ListView
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Reenabled ReturnsNonEmptyNativeBoundingBox tests #20238
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing, testing-reenable
  • [Testing] Added UITest to validate the Switch OnColor property #20542
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-switch, testing-flakiness
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added categories to Controls.AppiumTests #20642
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-refreshview
  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    area/testing, community ✨
  • Android Google Maps bump #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
